communityCategory.name: Videos of the member + text description of the team
communityCategory.text: There are ongoing debates on impacts of fourth industrial revolution, opportunities and challenges. The article below sets the context nicely and might be helpful when we have strategic conversations with CXOs. https://www.weforum.org/agenda/2016/01/the-fourth-industrial-revolution-what-it-means-and-how-to-respond/
